ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD security camera, high resolution of 700 TVL, enabling to obtain more natural high-definition video
Built-in 9-22mm zoom focus lens and 30 large infrared LEDs. NTSC system
Heavy duty metal bracket, pan 360 degree, tilt 90 degrees
Weatherproof aluminum outdoor housing, stand for use in all weather conditions, resistant to heavy rain and snow
Package included: 2 of Sony Effio CCD cameras, 2 of metal brackets, 2 of 12V DC power supplies, 2 of video power extension cables and bonus security warning stickers
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 2 Pack Security Cameras Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD DSP IR Day Night Vision 700TVL Outdoor Zoom WDR Infrared 9-22mm Varifocal Lens for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance System, including Power Supplies, Metal Brackets and Extension Camera Cables 1TQ
